cars.description: A homologation special built for DTM racing, featuring aggressive aerodynamics, a high-revving Cosworth-built engine, and a legendary motorsport pedigree.
One of the rarest and most expensive Mercedes models ever, built to dominate FIA GT racing with its road-legal variant being a true collector’s dream.
A collaboration between Mercedes and McLaren, blending grand touring luxury with supercar performance, featuring a long-nose design and carbon-fiber body.
A hardcore version of the CLK, inspired by Formula 1 safety cars, featuring a stripped-down interior, wider fenders, and an aggressive exhaust note.
The spiritual successor to the 300SL Gullwing, featuring iconic upward-opening doors, a lightweight aluminum chassis, and breathtaking performance.
An ultra-rugged, go-anywhere monster built for extreme off-roading, originally designed for military use but later released as a high-end luxury SUV.
A front-mid-engine sports car aimed at Porsche’s 911, delivering incredible handling, a muscular stance, and a roaring V8 soundtrack.
A rare and ultra-luxurious open-top cruiser with handcrafted interiors, opulent features, and effortless V12 power.
A family-friendly sleeper with supercar-like acceleration, featuring a sophisticated AWD system and a practical yet aggressive stance.
